snippet: To mark the conclusion of New York Fashion Week, we catalog the bows — some proud, some playful, some humble, some all of the above — of 19 fashion visionaries.
abstract: To mark the conclusion of New York Fashion Week, we catalog the bows — some proud, some playful, some humble, some all of the above — of 19 fashion visionaries.

headline.main: Curtain Call | The Designers of New York Fashion Week Take Their Bows
